Air Strike.title: Air Strike
Air Strike.shortDescription: Call in an airstrike on a target location
Air Strike.description: Players can launch an aerial bombardment at enemies or objectives for tactical advantage.

Ammo Resupply.title: Ammo Resupply
Ammo Resupply.description: Players receive extra ammunition periodically or on demand.

April Fools - Chat.title: April Fools - Chat
April Fools - Chat.description: Funny or mischievous chat effects triggered for April Fools.

April Fools - Word Shuffler.title: April Fools - Word Shuffler
April Fools - Word Shuffler.description: Shuffles or scrambles player chat for a humorous effect on April Fools.

Auto-Troll.title: Auto-Troll
Auto-Troll.description: Performs funny or unexpected actions automatically on players.

Beep On Join.title: Beep On Join
Beep On Join.description: Plays a beep sound when a new player joins the server.

Capture The Flag.title: Capture The Flag
Capture The Flag.description: Players try to capture the enemy flag while defending their own.

Color Changer.title: Color Changer
Color Changer.description: Allows changing player or vehicle colors dynamically.

Color Reservation.title: Color Reservation
Color Reservation.description: Reserves selected colors for specific players to avoid conflicts.

Custom Teleports.title: Custom Teleports
Custom Teleports.description: Players can teleport to predefined or custom locations on the map.

Damage Multiplier.title: Damage Multiplier
Damage Multiplier.description: Change how much damage weapons or abilities deal.

Deployable Mines.title: Deployable Mines
Deployable Mines.description: Players can place mines on the map to ambush opponents.

Expressions.title: Expressions
Expressions.description: Players can display or trigger visual/emote expressions in-game.

Flashlight-Vehicle-Entry.title: Flashlight-Vehicle-Entry
Flashlight-Vehicle-Entry.description: Activates flashlight automatically when players enter vehicles.

Flip a Coin.title: Flip a Coin
Flip a Coin.description: Players can flip a virtual coin to make decisions.

Flying Vehicles.title: Flying Vehicles
Flying Vehicles.description: Allows vehicles to fly temporarily for fun or tactical advantage.

Force-Chat.title: Force-Chat
Force-Chat.description: Forces players or server to display custom messages in chat.

Gravity Gun.title: Gravity Gun
Gravity Gun.description: Pick up, throw, or manipulate objects with gravity-based mechanics.

Grenade Launcher.title: Grenade Launcher
Grenade Launcher.description: Players can fire grenades with area-of-effect damage for tactical advantage.

Headshot Blocker.title: Headshot Blocker
Headshot Blocker.description: Blocks critical hits to make gameplay more forgiving.

Health Regeneration.title: Health Regeneration
Health Regeneration.description: Players regain health automatically after taking damage or over intervals.

Items from Heaven.title: Items from Heaven
Items from Heaven.description: Drops weapons or power-ups from the sky for players to collect.

Kill Counter.title: Kill Counter
Kill Counter.description: Displays or logs the number of kills for each player in real time.

Killer Reward.title: Killer Reward
Killer Reward.description: Rewards players with items, points, or perks after eliminating opponents.

Market (with Account Saving).title: Market (with Account Saving)
Market (with Account Saving).description: Players can buy items, and their inventory is saved across sessions.

Market (without account saving).title: Market (without account saving)
Market (without account saving).description: Players can buy items, but inventory resets each session.

Melee Kicker.title: Melee Kicker
Melee Kicker.description: Allows melee attacks to knock back or eject opponents from areas.

MVP Join Alerts.title: MVP Join Alerts
MVP Join Alerts.description: Notifies everyone when a high-performing player joins the server.

Player Vanish.title: Player Vanish
Player Vanish.description: Temporarily hides a player from others for stealth or fun.

Portal Gun (type 1).title: Portal Gun (type 1)
Portal Gun (type 1).description: Players can shoot portals to instantly travel between two points.

Portal Gun (type 2).title: Portal Gun (type 2)
Portal Gun (type 2).description: Variation of portal travel with unique behaviors or limitations.

Proximity Chat.title: Proximity Chat
Proximity Chat.description: Messages are only heard by nearby players, simulating realistic proximity.

Rage Quit.title: Rage Quit
Rage Quit.description: Triggers a reaction or logs when a player leaves in anger.

Random Fact Generator.title: Random Fact Generator
Random Fact Generator.description: Shows random facts or info to players periodically.

Random Name.title: Random Name
Random Name.description: Assigns random or funny names to players for variety.

Rank System.title: Rank System
Rank System.description: Assigns ranks or levels to players based on performance or achievements.

RCON Chat.title: RCON Chat
RCON Chat.description: Allows administrators to send messages to the server remotely.

Replace Weapon Projectile.title: Replace Weapon Projectile
Replace Weapon Projectile.description: Changes the behavior or type of projectiles fired by weapons.

Rocket Launcher Malfunction.title: Rocket Launcher Malfunction
Rocket Launcher Malfunction.description: Causes rocket launchers to occasionally behave unpredictably for fun.

Roll-The-Dice.title: Roll-The-Dice
Roll-The-Dice.description: Applies random buffs, debuffs, or events when a dice is rolled.

Self-Destruction.title: Self-Destruction
Self-Destruction.shortDescription: Destroy your own vehicle or player
Self-Destruction.description: Allows self-elimination of a player or vehicle, optionally with a timer.

Server Fun Plus.title: Server Fun Plus
Server Fun Plus.description: Adds entertaining mechanics or events for server enjoyment.

Shield Regen.title: Shield Regen
Shield Regen.description: Automatically regenerates player shields gradually or after avoiding damage.

Spawn From Sky.title: Spawn From Sky
Spawn From Sky.description: Players appear dropping from above instead of normal spawn points.

Spawn Protection.title: Spawn Protection
Spawn Protection.description: Players are immune to damage briefly after spawning to prevent spawn killing.

Spawn Where Killed.title: Spawn Where Killed
Spawn Where Killed.description: Players respawn at the location they died instead of default points.

Sprint System.title: Sprint System
Sprint System.description: Adds a stamina-based sprint mechanic to players.

Stun Grenades.title: Stun Grenades
Stun Grenades.description: Deploy grenades that temporarily disorient or slow opponents.

Super Bloogulch.title: Super Bloogulch
Super Bloogulch.description: Enables a unique enhanced mode with exaggerated player abilities.

Super Jump.title: Super Jump
Super Jump.description: Players gain enhanced jump height and distance for fun or mobility.

Tactical Airstrike.title: Tactical Airstrike
Tactical Airstrike.description: Call in precision airstrikes on specific locations or players.

Tactical Insertion.title: Tactical Insertion
Tactical Insertion.description: Allows players to respawn at custom strategic points instead of default spawn locations.

Taunt OnGameEnd (messages).title: Taunt OnGameEnd (messages)
Taunt OnGameEnd (messages).description: Automatically sends taunts to players when the game ends.

Taunt Your Players (v2.0).title: Taunt Your Players (v2.0)
Taunt Your Players (v2.0).description: Sends humorous or teasing messages to players during the game.

Taunt Your Players.title: Taunt Your Players
Taunt Your Players.description: Displays funny or provocative messages to players in-game.

Tea Bagging.title: Tea Bagging
Tea Bagging.description: Allows players to perform the infamous ‘tea bag’ action in-game.

Truce 2.0.title: Truce 2.0
Truce 2.0.description: Disables combat between players for a short duration to enforce a truce.

Uber (TAXI).title: Uber (TAXI)
Uber (TAXI).description: Players can summon or ride vehicles as if using a taxi service.

Vanish (LURKER).title: Vanish (LURKER)
Vanish (LURKER).description: Players become invisible or undetectable to others temporarily.

Weapon Durability & Jam System.title: Weapon Durability & Jam System
Weapon Durability & Jam System.description: Weapons can degrade or jam after repeated use, requiring maintenance.

Weighted Weapons.title: Weighted Weapons
Weighted Weapons.description: Changes movement speed or handling based on equipped weapons.

[MODE] Destroy Gun.title: [MODE] Destroy Gun
[MODE] Destroy Gun.description: A custom mode where guns have destructive or altered behavior.

[MODE] Enter Gun.title: [MODE] Enter Gun
[MODE] Enter Gun.description: Players start with a specific gun in a unique mode.

[MODE] Spawn Gun.title: [MODE] Spawn Gun
[MODE] Spawn Gun.description: Automatically gives players guns on spawn for a custom game mode.

Attrition.title: Attrition
Attrition.description: Players compete in teams, aiming to reduce the opposing team's numbers to zero.

Cranked.title: Cranked
Cranked.description: Players gain speed and urgency after each kill, encouraging constant action.

Divide & Conquer.title: Divide & Conquer
Divide & Conquer.description: Teams capture zones and outmaneuver opponents to control the map.

Frag Nation.title: Frag Nation
Frag Nation.description: Players rack up points by eliminating enemies in a free-for-all or team setting.

Gun Game.title: Gun Game
Gun Game.description: Players progress through a series of weapons with each kill, aiming to reach the final weapon first.

Hunter-Prey.title: Hunter-Prey
Hunter-Prey.description: One team hunts while the other team tries to survive or complete objectives.

Juggernaut.title: Juggernaut
Juggernaut.description: One player becomes the Juggernaut with enhanced abilities, while others try to take them down.

Kill Confirmed.title: Kill Confirmed
Kill Confirmed.description: Players must collect fallen enemies' tags to score points for their team.

Melee Attack.title: Melee Attack
Melee Attack.description: Players can only eliminate opponents using melee attacks, emphasizing agility and timing.

Needlers-Galore.title: Needlers Galore
Needlers-Galore.description: Players exclusively use Needlers to score kills and dominate the map.

One In The Chamber.title: One In The Chamber
One In The Chamber.description: Players have only one bullet per life, making every shot critical.

Parkour Timer.title: Parkour Timer
Parkour Timer.description: Players race through parkour challenges while being timed, aiming for fastest completion.

Sabotage.title: Sabotage
Sabotage.description: Players aim to destroy objectives or equipment while preventing the opposing team from doing the same.

SDTM.title: SDTM
SDTM.description: A custom game mode where players compete using sniper rifles, emphasizing precision, positioning, and long-range combat.

Shotty-Snipes.title: Shotty-Snipes
Shotty-Snipes.description: Players alternate between shotguns and sniper rifles, testing versatility and positioning.

Survival Slayer.title: Survival Slayer
Survival Slayer.description: Teams fight until one survives; focus is on endurance and strategic elimination.

Swat.title: Swat
Swat.description: Players face off with increased damage and no shields, emphasizing accuracy and tactics.

Tag.title: Tag
Tag.description: Players try to tag opponents or avoid being tagged, turning the map into a giant playground.

Team Defender.title: Team Defender
Team Defender.description: Teams defend their area while attempting to capture or attack opposing zones.

admin-chat.title: Admin Chat
admin-chat.shortDescription: Custom chat channel for server admins
admin-chat.description: Toggleable admin-only chat system for communication among server administrators.

admin-messages.title: Admin Messages
admin-messages.description: Announces a special message to all players when a VIP admin joins the server.

admin-add-me.title: Admin Add Me
admin-add-me.description: Allows authorized users to automatically grant themselves admin privileges.

afk-system.title: AFK System
afk-system.description: Monitors player activity and automatically kicks players who remain AFK beyond a configurable threshold.

alias-system.title: Alias System
alias-system.description: Look up aliases based CD Key Hash, IP Address, ID or Name.

anti-aimbot.title: Anti Aimbot
anti-aimbot.description: Monitors player accuracy and suspicious aiming patterns to identify and mitigate aimbot usage.

anti-impersonator.title: Anti Impersonator
anti-impersonator.shortDescription: Prevent players from impersonating clan/community members
anti-impersonator.description: Detects and removes players attempting to impersonate trusted members, supporting kick/ban and logging.

anti-camp-v1.title: Anti-Camp V1
anti-camp-v1.description: Detects players camping in restricted areas and applies warnings or penalties.

anti-camp-v2.title: Anti-Camp V2
anti-camp-v2.description: Enhanced camping detection with configurable zones, timers, and punishments.

auto-message.title: Auto Message
auto-message.description: Automatically sends configurable messages to all players at set intervals.

auto-team-balance.title: Auto Team Balance
auto-team-balance.description: Reassigns players to maintain even teams based on player count and skill levels.

auto-lead.title: Auto Lead
auto-lead.description: Automatically toggles SAPP's lead mode based on specified map and game type configurations

ban-on-sight.title: Ban On Sight
ban-on-sight.description: Allows admins to immediately ban players upon detection or suspicion of rule violations.

block-duplicate-ips.title: Block Duplicate IPs
block-duplicate-ips.shortDescription: Prevent multiple connections from same IP
block-duplicate-ips.description: Blocks new connections if the IP is already connected, useful to prevent multi-clienting or alt accounts.

block-or-replace-objects.title: Block or Replace Objects
block-or-replace-objects.description: Blocks or replaces unwanted in-game objects to maintain map integrity or prevent exploits.

block-team-damage.title: Block Team Damage
block-team-damage.description: Prevents players from damaging teammates, configurable per team or globally.

chat-ids.title: Chat IDs
chat-ids.description: Shows player IDs in the chat for easier identification.

clear-chat.title: Clear Chat
clear-chat.description: Clears the server chat for all players instantly.

client-crasher.title: Client Crasher
client-crasher.description: This tool will crash clients to the desktop

console-logo.title: Console Logo
console-logo.description: Shows a custom ASCII logo in the server console upon startup.

countdown-timer.title: Countdown Timer
countdown-timer.description: Displays a configurable countdown timer to players for events or map changes.

custom-colors.title: Custom Colors
custom-colors.description: Allows modification of in-game colors for players or teams.

custom-command-cooldowns.title: Custom Command Cooldowns
custom-command-cooldowns.description: Configurable cooldown periods for commands to prevent spam or abuse.

custom-loadouts.title: Custom Loadouts
custom-loadouts.description: Players receive predefined weapon or equipment loadouts upon spawn or command execution.

custom-vehicle-spawner.title: Custom Vehicle Spawner
custom-vehicle-spawner.description: Replaces default vehicle spawns with custom locations and configurations.

damage-multiplier-changer.title: Damage Multiplier (Changer)
damage-multiplier-changer.description: Admins can modify the damage multiplier for all players or specific teams, useful for balancing gameplay.

delay-skip.title: Delay Skip
delay-skip.shortDescription: Prevent players from skipping the map too early
delay-skip.description: Prevents players from skipping the map too early, useful for custom game modes.

disable-fall-damage.title: Disable Fall Damage
disable-fall-damage.shortDescription: Prevent players from taking fall damage
disable-fall-damage.description: Disables fall damage globally or for specific players, useful for custom game modes.

dynamic-ping-kicker.title: Dynamic Ping Kicker
dynamic-ping-kicker.description: Monitors player ping and kicks players who exceed a configurable threshold, reducing lag for others.

dynamic-score-limit.title: Dynamic Score Limit
dynamic-score-limit.description: Automatically adjusts the score limit based on player count or other factors.

freeze-players.title: Freeze Players
freeze-players.description: Admins can freeze selected players or entire teams, preventing movement or actions.

game-countdown.title: Game Countdown
game-countdown.description: Displays a configurable countdown timer to signal the start of a match or event.

get-object-identity.title: Get Object Identity
get-object-identity.description: Displays the internal IDs and properties of objects in the game world for debugging or scripting.

get-server-name-example.title: Get Server Name (Example)
get-server-name-example.description: Demonstrates retrieving the server name programmatically for logging or display purposes.

item-sky-spawner.title: Item Sky Spawner
item-sky-spawner.description: Spawns objects or items from above the map at configurable intervals or locations.

kill-zones.title: Kill Zones
kill-zones.description: Creates designated areas where players instantly die or take damage, for map control or game modes.

list-players.title: List Players
list-players.description: Shows a list of currently connected players with IDs, teams, and statuses.

live-on-3.title: Live on 3
live-on-3.description: Announces a 'Live on 3' countdown to signal the start of a game or match.

map-vote-system.title: Map Vote System
map-vote-system.shortDescription: Allow players to vote for next map
map-vote-system.description: Players vote for the next map using a menu or chat commands, with results applied automatically.

mapcycle-manager.title: Mapcycle Manager
mapcycle-manager.description: Manages map cycles with automatic transitions and voting overrides.

multiclient-detector.title: MultiClient Detector
multiclient-detector.description: Identifies players connected from multiple clients to prevent cheating or exploits.

mute-system.title: Mute System
mute-system.description: Admins can mute individual players or entire teams, blocking messages from appearing in chat.

name-ban.title: Name Ban
name-ban.shortDescription: Prevent players from using banned names
name-ban.description: Blocks players from using offensive or restricted names, optionally kicking or banning them.

name-replacer.title: Name Replacer
name-replacer.description: Renames players in real-time based on configured rules to maintain community standards.

notify-me.title: Notify Me
notify-me.description: Sends notifications to admins for specific events such as player joins, map changes, or rule violations.

on-teleport.title: OnTeleport
on-teleport.description: Executes configurable actions when a player teleports, useful for event handling or logging.

ping-checker.title: Ping Checker
ping-checker.description: Periodically checks player ping and logs or warns high-latency connections.

play-time.title: Play Time
play-time.description: Records and displays how long each player has been active on the server.

random-grenades.title: Random Grenades
random-grenades.description: Randomly spawns grenades on the map to increase chaos or fun in custom game modes.

remove-grenades.title: Remove Grenades (On Spawn)
remove-grenades.description: Removes grenades immediately after spawn to prevent map clutter or unbalanced gameplay.

restart-mapcycle.title: Restart Mapcycle
restart-mapcycle.description: Resets the mapcycle to the first map, optionally applying any voting overrides.

score-handler.title: Score Handler
score-handler.description: Tracks, modifies, and displays player scores with configurable rules and multipliers.

script-manager.title: Script Manager
script-manager.description: Admin utility to manage active scripts, reload changes, and debug script issues in real-time.

server-logger.title: Server Logger
server-logger.description: Records server events such as joins, leaves, kills, and commands to files for auditing or analytics.

server-name-changer.title: Server Name Changer
server-name-changer.description: Allows admins to change the server name on the fly, useful for events or branding.

set-respawn-time.title: Set Respawn Time
set-respawn-time.description: Admins can configure respawn timers globally or per team to modify gameplay pacing.

show-admin-names.title: Show Admin Names
show-admin-names.description: Lists currently connected admins in chat or via command for transparency.

simple-poll-system.title: Simple Poll System
simple-poll-system.description: Allows players to vote on options, with results displayed in chat.

spawn-protection-v1.title: Spawn Protection V1
spawn-protection-v1.description: Grants temporary invincibility to players after spawning to reduce unfair deaths.

status-timer.title: Status Timer
status-timer.description: Displays or logs timers for statuses such as buffs, debuffs, or cooldowns.

suicide-punisher.title: Suicide Punisher
suicide-punisher.description: Applies penalties for players who repeatedly kill themselves to prevent exploits or griefing.

suspend-players.title: Suspend Players
suspend-players.description: Allows admins to suspend player actions, including movement, chat, and attacks, for a configurable duration.

sync-admins-utility.title: Sync Admins (Utility)
sync-admins-utility.description: Ensures all servers in a network have updated admin lists and permissions.

sync-your-files.title: Sync Your Files
sync-your-files.description: Uploads or updates scripts on the server to match a local repository or file set.

t-slayer-team-spawns.title: T-Slayer Team Spawns
t-slayer-team-spawns.description: Sets custom spawn locations for T-Slayer or similar team-based modes.

team-chat.title: Team Chat
team-chat.description: Enables a separate chat channel for teams, invisible to opponents.

team-color-voting.title: Team Color Voting
team-color-voting.description: Allows players to vote for team colors before match start, applied automatically.

team-shuffler.title: Team Shuffler
team-shuffler.description: Randomly assigns players to teams to maintain fairness and variety in matches.

teleport-manager.title: Teleport Manager
teleport-manager.description: Admins can teleport players individually, in groups, or to preset locations.

the-punisher-v1.title: The Punisher (v1.0)
the-punisher-v1.description: Implements automatic punishments for players breaking configurable rules, including kicks, bans, and score penalties.

vehicle-block-utility-v1.title: Vehicle Block Utility v1
vehicle-block-utility-v1.description: Blocks specific vehicles from spawning or being used, configurable by admin.

vehicle-block-utility-v2.title: Vehicle Block Utility v2
vehicle-block-utility-v2.description: Enhanced vehicle blocking with additional options, such as team-specific or temporary blocks.

vote-kick.title: Vote Kick
vote-kick.description: Allows players to initiate votes to kick disruptive players, with configurable thresholds.

vpn-blocker.title: VPN Blocker
vpn-blocker.description: Blocks or warns players connecting via VPN to prevent evasion of bans or multi-accounting.

weapon-assigner.title: Weapon Assigner
weapon-assigner.description: Automatically provides players with specific weapons on spawn or via command.

welcome-message-req.title: Welcome Message [req]
welcome-message-req.description: Sends personalized welcome messages to players when they join the server.

word-buster.title: Word Buster
word-buster.description: Detects and removes offensive or banned words in chat messages, optionally replacing them.
